hero.question: Will Viking Therapeutics be acquired before 2027?
hero.prob_take: The prediction market is pricing in a 63% chance Viking gets acquired before 2027, up 11.5 points in a day, signaling serious chatter about a deal. The real tell will be whether the biotech's GLP-1 pipeline gains enough traction to attract a heavyweight buyer or if the stock cools once the hype settles.

daily_take.headline: Viking Therapeutics Just Got Expensive. Someone Knows Something.
daily_take.deck: Viking's acquisition odds jumped 11 points overnight to 63%, a move that screams insider conviction. The biotech stock has been on a tear, and big pharma is clearly circling. When prediction markets shift this fast on a $1.4M volume play, the smart money usually has better information than the rest of us.
